pageContext.claim: “So one of the things, I think, that's very important is that the Prime Minister of Japan is going to be purchasing massive amounts of military equipment, as he should. And we make the best military equipment, by far. He'll be purchasing it from the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: The Japanese government immediately disputed this statement. The Japan Times quoted a defense official as saying: “We’ll proceed with the existing plan, without worrying about the president’s remarks.”
